Name: GW2 MumbleLink
Description: Real-time Guild Wars 2 status via MumbleLink shared memory
io.piercefamily.gw2.profession.Name: Profession & Spec
io.piercefamily.gw2.profession.Tooltip: Shows current character profession and elite specialization
io.piercefamily.gw2.gamemode.Name: Game Mode
io.piercefamily.gw2.gamemode.Tooltip: Shows current game mode (Open World, WvW, PvP, etc.)
io.piercefamily.gw2.mapname.Name: Map Name
io.piercefamily.gw2.combat.Name: Combat Status
io.piercefamily.gw2.combat.Tooltip: Shows whether character is in combat
io.piercefamily.gw2.chatfocus.Name: Chat Focus
io.piercefamily.gw2.chatfocus.Tooltip: Shows whether chat textbox has focus
io.piercefamily.gw2.commander.Name: Commander
io.piercefamily.gw2.commander.Tooltip: Shows whether commander tag is active
io.piercefamily.gw2.mount.Name: Mount
io.piercefamily.gw2.wvwteam.Name: WvW Team
io.piercefamily.gw2.gamefocus.Name: Game Focus
io.piercefamily.gw2.gamefocus.Tooltip: Shows whether GW2 is the active window
io.piercefamily.gw2.tpprice.Name: TP Price
io.piercefamily.gw2.tpprice.Tooltip: Shows Trading Post price for a chosen item
